title: Ep 198: Steve Harvey Really Ruined Dating
itunes:title: Ep 198: Steve Harvey Really Ruined Dating
description:
In one of the last episodes of the year, the duo talk about how 2020 has changed their lives for the better and things they have learned about themselves. Weezy opens up about her comedy/TV dreams and current gigs and Mandii shares how she plans to release her own feminine hygiene products in 2021 under her Official Box Owner Company. 


This week’s Vanilla Sh-t is a story about a woman being able to annul her marriage because her husband couldn’t get hard ( https://www.vice.com/en/article/k7qdjn/judge-allows-annulment-because-husband-couldnt-keep-erection ) And we bring back Kink of the Week thanks to a beaux mail letter that discusses being turned on by tampons! 

Whorederve- How to finger someone with Acrylic nails https://www.vice.com/en/article/v7m43m/how-to-finger-someone-when-you-have-acrylic-nails The Whoreible Decision this week digs into dating & why Steve Harvey single handedly ruined dating for us all with his book Act Like a Woman, Think Like a Man. 


Follow the hosts on social media Weezy @Weezywtf & Mandii @Fullcourtpumps and follow the Whoreible Decisions pages

Instagram @whoreible_decisions

Twitter @whoreiblepod


Don't forget to tag #whoreibledecisions or @ us to let us know what you think of this week's episode!


Want more? Bonus episodes, merch and more Whoreible Decisions!! Become a Patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecisions

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
